DOC.brief_title: Comparison Dexmedetomidine Remifentanil Infusion During CABG
DOC.detailed_description: Alpha2-adrenergic agonist , dexmedetomidine , recently use sedation , analgesia adjuvant general anesthesia . Postsynaptic activation alpha2 adrenoceptors central nervous system ( CNS ) inhibit sympathetic activity thus decrease blood pressure heart rate . The blockade sympathetic activity decrease neuroendocrine stress response may decrease incidence hypokalemia . The hypokalemia increase incidence arrythmia , especially cardiac patient . We postulate dexmedetomidine could decrease neuroendocrine stress response , thus decrease arrhythmia cardiac surgery . Furthermore , dexmedetomidine report cardioprotective effect previous animal study . Therefore , aim present study investigate whether intraoperative dexmedetomidine infusion reduce incidence hypokalemia arrythmia , myocardial injury subject undergo off-pump coronary artery bypass graft . We also try compare effect remifentanil infusion .
